apikey.description: The APIkey to authenticate call to the API

tenant_id.description: The identifier of your tenant (most of the time, your tenant id is a trigram in the url of your TETHRIS instance; eg: https://{tenant_id}.tehtris.net)

alternative_url.description: The alternative url to contact the TEHTRIS instance

description: [TEHTRIS](https://tehtris.com) is a cybersecurity company offering products designed to protect endpoints against knwon and unknown threats
name: TEHTRIS
